    "PUT",
    "/_connector/my-g-drive-connector/_filtering",
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    body={
        "rules": [
            {
                "field": "file_extension",
                "id": "exclude-txt-files",
                "order": 0,
                "policy": "exclude",
                "rule": "equals",
                "value": "txt"
            },
            {
                "field": "_",
                "id": "DEFAULT",
                "order": 1,
                "policy": "include",
                "rule": "regex",
                "value": ".*"
            }
        ]
    },
)
